forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing overnight. Low 8C. W winds at 15 to 30 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers and windy conditions developing overnight. Low 46F. W winds at 10 to 20 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thunderstorms. High 12C. Winds W at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thunderstorms. High 52F. Winds W at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. SW winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 45F. SW winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
